item.title: Website Button Help
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

[quote=“CoderJessee, post:7, topic:481255”][quote author=RS PS link=topic=599494.msg4212872#msg4212872 date=1359831094]

you have to change the “#” in the webclient

Make a file called “webclient.html” with out the quotes then replace your webclient button with this: <a href="webclient.html"Webclient

Nope, that doesn’t work it removes the button completely. And I want it to go to different links.
[/quote]

The ‘href="#"’ part is where it links to a web page. Replace the # with where you it to link it to. For example, your webclient file is called “webclient.html”, the code should be:

Hope this helped.[/quote]

Ahh done that before I read this. Yeah I just replaced the hash with the link. But thanks for trying to help.

Fixed mod close plox.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Button Help
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“RS PS, post:5, topic:481255”][quote author=jal knight link=topic=599494.msg4212772#msg4212772 date=1359821766]
you have to change the “#” in the webclient

Make a file called “webclient.html” with out the quotes then replace your webclient button with this: <a href="webclient.html"Webclient
[/quote]

Nope, that doesn’t work it removes the button completely. And I want it to go to different links.[/quote]

The ‘href="#"’ part is where it links to a web page. Replace the # with where you it to link it to. For example, your webclient file is called “webclient.html”, the code should be:

Hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Button Help
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh123 pkerjosh123
item.description:
@pkerjosh123 wrote:

He clearly dont know shit about html ^ however this is the last time ill spoon feed.

<ul class="navigation"> <li> <a class="active" href="forums.php">FORUMS</a> </li> <li> <a href="webclient.html">WEBCLIENT</a> </li> <li> <a href="vote.html">VOTE</a> </li> <li> <a href="donate.html">DONATE</a> </li> </ul> </div>

item.title: Website Button Help
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“pkerjosh123, post:3, topic:481255”]replace

<ul class="navigation"> <li> <a class="active" href="#">FORUMS</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">WEBCLIENT</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">VOTE</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">DONATE</a> </li> </ul> </div>

With this

<ul class="navigation"> <li> <a class="active" href="forums.html">FORUMS</a> </li> <li> <a href="webclient.html">WEBCLIENT</a> </li> <li> <a href="vote.html">VOTE</a> </li> <li> <a href="donate.html">DONATE</a> </li> </ul> </div>[/quote]
Do you feel cool rewording what I told him?

Oh and I seriously doubt someone will have a file called “forum.html”

Read full topic
